subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. will not reschedule the Winter Classic, a regular-season showcase for the league that is currently scheduled for Jan. 1, if a settlement with the players’ union is not reached.
snippet: The N.H.L. will not reschedule the Winter Classic, a regular-season showcase for the league that is currently scheduled for Jan. 1, if a settlement with the players’ union is not reached.
